verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> that <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> both <S%G2596>together<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2980>spake,<s%> <S%G5620>that<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> also of the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G4100>believed.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G544>unbelieving<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> stirred <S%G1892>up<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> made their minds evil <S%G2559>affected<s%> <S%G5590><s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren.<s%>

Long <S%G2425><s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1304>abode<s%> they speaking <S%G3955>boldly<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> gave <S%G3140>testimony<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>granted<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%> to be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4977>divided:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>part<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2258>held<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>part<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> an <S%G3730>assault<s%> made <S%G5037>both<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> also of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G758>rulers,<s%> to use them <S%G5195>despitefully,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3036>stone<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%>

They were aware <S%G4894>of<s%> it, and <S%G2703>fled<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe,<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G3071>Lycaonia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> into <S%G3588>the<s%> region that lieth round about: <S%G4066><s%>
And <S%G2546>there<s%> they preached the <S%G2258>gospel.<s%> <S%G2097><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G2521>sat<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra,<s%> <S%G102>impotent<s%> in his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> a <S%G5560>cripple<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> had walked: <S%G4043><s%>

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2980>speak:<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> steadfastly <S%G816>beholding<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>perceiving<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> to be <S%G4982>healed,<s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G450>Stand<s%> <S%G3717>upright<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>feet.<s%> And he <S%G242>leaped<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4043>walked.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G4160>done,<s%> they lifted <S%G1869>up<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G5456>voices,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> in the speech of <S%G3072>Lycaonia,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G2316>gods<s%> are come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> in the <S%G3666>likeness<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> they <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2203>Jupiter;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G2060>Mercurius,<s%> <S%G1894>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G2233>speaker.<s%> <S%G3056><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> of <S%G2203>Jupiter,<s%> which <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G5022>oxen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4725>garlands<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4440>gates,<s%> and <S%G2309>would<s%> have done <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people.<s%>

Which <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of, they <S%G1284>rent<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2440>clothes,<s%> and ran <S%G1530>in<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> crying <S%G2896>out,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G435>Sirs,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> ye these <S%G5023>things?<s%> <S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> of like <S%G3663>passions<s%> with <S%G5213>you,<s%> and <S%G2097>preach<s%> unto <S%G5209>you<s%> that ye should <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3152>vanities<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> are <S%G1722>therein:<s%> <S%G846><s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1074>times<s%> <S%G3944>past<s%> <S%G1439>suffered<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> to <S%G4198>walk<s%> in their <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G3598>ways.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%G2544><s%> he <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> without <S%G267>witness,<s%> in that he did <S%G15>good,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G5205>rain<s%> from <S%G3771>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2593>fruitful<s%> <S%G2540>seasons,<s%> <S%G1705>filling<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> with <S%G5160>food<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2167>gladness.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G3004>sayings<s%> <S%G3433>scarce<s%> <S%G2664>restrained<s%> they <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> that they had <S%G3361>not<s%> done <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there came <S%G1904>thither<s%> certain <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> <S%G2532>who<s%> <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> having <S%G3034>stoned<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G4951>drew<s%> him <S%G1854>out<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3543>supposing<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> had been <S%G2348>dead.<s%>

Howbeit, <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> stood round <S%G2944>about<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he rose <S%G450>up,<s%> and <S%G1525>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> next <S%G1887>day<s%> he <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe.<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> when they had preached the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G3100>taught<s%> <S%G2425>many,<s%> they returned <S%G5290>again<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%>

Confirming <S%G1991><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G3870>exhorting<s%> them to <S%G1696>continue<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they had <S%G5500>ordained<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> in every <S%G2596>church,<s%> <S%G1577><s%> and had <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3521>fasting,<s%> they <S%G3908>commended<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G4100>believed.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> after they had passed <S%G1330>throughout<s%> <S%G4099>Pisidia,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3828>Pamphylia.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when they had <S%G2980>preached<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4011>Perga,<s%> they went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> Attalia: <S%G825><s%>

And <S%G2547>thence<s%> <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> from <S%G3606>whence<s%> they had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G3860>recommended<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they were <S%G3854>come,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had gathered the church <S%G4863>together,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1577><s%> they <S%G312>rehearsed<s%> all <S%G3745>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> he had <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> they <S%G1304>abode<s%> <S%G3756>long<s%> <S%G3641><s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>
